section.section: The associate directors shall assist primarily in discharging the diagnostic and remediation functions of the Institution.
The warden shall assist primarily in discharging the custodial function of the Institution.

text.section: The staff members of the Institution are entitled to compensation as provided in the State budget.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection or any other law, the staff members of the Institution are in the skilled service or professional service in the State Personnel Management System.

The Director and each individual appointed under paragraph (2)(i) of this subsection are in the executive service, in the management service, or a special appointment in the State Personnel Management System.
